unnormalised: RBI announced a new rule today: all bank customers must now register their PAN card and Aadhaar number with their accounts. Failure to do so by 31/12/2024 will result in accounts being temporarily frozen. Sources say this is to curb fraud, but honestly, it feels like they just want to know how many samosas you can buy with your UPI ID each month.
normalised: R-B-I announced a new rule today: all bank customers must now register their P-A-N card and Aadhaar number with their accounts. Failure to do so by thirty first december two thousand and twenty four will result in accounts being temporarily frozen. Sources say this is to curb fraud, but honestly, it feels like they just want to know how many samosas you can buy with your U-P-I I-D each month.

unnormalised: Citizens are understandably thrilled... or maybe not. Social media is buzzing with memes already. Another shows someone using their IFSC code as a Wi-Fi password, clearly having a little too much faith in their memory.
